ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if (baseUrl.match(/http/)){
let base64 = java.base64Encode(baseUrl);
let result = `data:;base64,${base64},{"type":"url"}`;
java.put('url',result)
let url = java.base64Decode(base64);
java.ajax(url);}else{
java.ajax(java.hexDecodeToString(result))
}
</js>

searchUrl:
